page.title: 11PRINCIPLE FEATURES
page.content: The Mall is probably the main shopping centre in Dagenham. It was opened in 1980.It is an advantage to many people because, there is somewhere for them to do their shopping. To some people in Blackbourne road however it is a disadvantage, because the people who do their shopping in Sainsburies, park their cars down Blackbourne road ,and they leave their trollies there. The Mall could have been a good idea , but all it seems to consist of are cheap shops and jewellers. People still travel to Ilford or Romford for the better stores like Marks and Spencers. There has also been a lot of vandalism in the car park. Today the Mall has a security system operating which consists of security men, video cameras and iron fencing at night.
